================================================================================
                            ⚠️  IMPORTANT / 重要提示  ⚠️
================================================================================

【English】

1. This AT firmware is a temporary build for testing purposes only!
2. This AT firmware does not support official OTA functionality (AT+CIUPDATE).
3. If you plan to use this firmware for mass production, please make sure to conduct comprehensive function verification and testing based on the actual application scenarios of your product.
4. If you need released AT firmware for mass production, please visit https://www.espressif.com/en/contact-us/at-firmware-application to fill out the application form.
5. If you need AT firmware with official OTA support (AT+CIUPDATE support based on item 1) for mass production, please contact Espressif sales via one of the following channels:
   Sales contact page: https://www.espressif.com/en/contact-us/sales-questions
   Email: sales@espressif.com
   If contacting via email, please specify "Request GitHub Actions AT Firmware Download Link with Official OTA Support" in the subject line and provide the following information in the email body.
      Company name:
      Espressif product you are using:
      Project name:
      Application scenario:
      Project start date:
      Expected mass production date:
      Project status:
      Estimated annual purchase quantity:
      Required AT firmware version: <Fill in the URL link of the temporary build version from item 1, and indicate that official OTA support (AT+CIUPDATE) is required>
      Details:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

【中文】

1. 此 AT 固件为临时构建版本，仅供测试使用！
2. 此 AT 固件不支持官方 OTA 功能 (AT+CIUPDATE)。
3. 若使用此固件量产，请务必依据您产品的实际应用场景进行全面的功能验证与测试。
4. 若需发布的 AT 固件用于量产，请访问 https://www.espressif.com/zh-hans/contact-us/at-firmware-application 填写申请表获取。
5. 若需支持官方 OTA 功能的 AT 固件（在第 1 条的基础上加上 AT+CIUPDATE 支持）用于量产，请通过以下任一渠道联系乐鑫商务
   联系商务页面：https://www.espressif.com.cn/zh-hans/contact-us/sales-questions
   电子邮箱：sales@espressif.com
   若通过邮件联系，请在邮件主题注明“请求支持官方 OTA 功能的 GitHub Actions AT 固件下载链接”，并在邮件正文中提供如下信息。
      贵司名称：
      使用的乐鑫产品：
      项目名称：
      应用场景：
      项目启动日期：
      预计量产日期：
      项目状态：
      年预计采购数量：
      需要的 AT 固件版本：<填写第 1 条临时构建版本的 URL 链接，并注明需要支持官方 OTA 功能 (AT+CIUPDATE)>
      详情：

================================================================================
